wikipedia_page.main: Raymond Lockwood (12 December 1928 – 31 December 2009) was a British figure skater who competed in ice dance. He competed in the pairs event at the 1952 Winter Olympics.With partner Barbara Radford, he won the bronze medal at the 1955 World Figure Skating Championships.
